Orem.Cascade Mountain (Utah):
Cascade Mountain is located in central Utah (Utah County just east of Provo and Orem Utah). With an elevation of 10,908 feet (3,325 m), it is not as high as its neighbors to the north (Mount Timpanogos 11,752 ft) and Provo Peak (11,068 ft) to the south but it one of the major peaks of the Wasatch Range.


== Hiking ==
There are several access routes to the summit.
